948980.name: C-ZERO [Carsteroids Zero]
948980.description:
C-ZERO (Carsteroids Zero: Troopers Training Ground) is a spin-off of Carsteroids, experienced from the perspective of the V-Troopers, one of the main antagonists in the original game.

As a recruit of the V-Troopers, the elite defence force of Asteroid Vesta, your mission is to test cutting-edge experimental weapons in high-stakes combat scenarios using a specially outfitted combat vehicle. These trials will prepare you for real battlefield conditions where enforcers will rely on this tech.

Your primary objective is to survive for 150 seconds, carefully planning each shot. The one rule: Don't get hit.

Press [F] to toggle fullscreen.

Press [M] to toggle music.

Press [ESC] or [P] to open in-game menu.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

[Z] - Fire/Select

[X] - Reload

[Up] - Accelerate

[Down] - Brake/Reverse

[UP]+[DOWN] - Drift

[Left/Right] - Steer

[S] - Use Item: Shield

[D] - Use Item: Drug

[SPACE] - Use Item: Bomb

[ESC] or [/P][P] - open in-game menu

GAMEPAD CONTROLS (xbox360 compatible)

[A] - Fire/Select

[B] - Reload

[RT] - Accelerate

[LT] - Brake/Reverse

[LT]+[RT] - Drift

[Left Analog] - Steer

[Y] - Use Item: Shield

[X] - Use Item: Drug

[LB] - Use Item: Bomb

[Start] - Open in-game menu

[D-pad] - Menu Navigation[/B][/P]
